title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: When the font size of a label is modified, the height of the label does not adjust accordingly.
EB: The label height should automatically adjust to accommodate the new font size when it is modified.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Add a label. 2. Edit the font size of the label to "18 points".
